metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37999 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient data validation in New Tab Page in Google Chrome prior to95.0.4638.69 allowed a remote attacker to inject arbitrary scripts or HTMLin a new browser tab via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
